DOC.brief_title: Osteopathic Manipulative Treatment Individuals With Temporomandibular Disorder Who Make Use Occlusal Splints
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : It know multifactorial etiology Temporomandibular Disorders ( TMD ) raise need multidisciplinary approach treatment . Studies present good result use occlusal splint along therapy . The Osteopathic Manipulative Treatment ( OMT ) characteristic philosophy global approach precise functional diagnosis . Based lack randomize blind trial subject , This study aim contribute investigation therapeutic effect OMT pain intensity Quality Life participant diagnose TMD make use occlusal splint . Methodology : This study randomize blind trial , sample compose 18 participant referred occlusion clinic Fluminense Federal University ( UFF ) , diagnose team dentist intern occlusion clinic Research Diagnostic Criteria Temporomandibular Disorders ( RDC/TMD ) . The participant complete Short Form 36 Health Survey ( SF-36 ) measure quality life , pain intensity diagram Visual Analogic Scale ( VAS ) measure pain intensity . The sample randomize 2 group ( 9 individual ) : Test Group ( TG ) - patient subject Clinical Treatment splint ( CT ) offer Occlusion Clinic unit along Osteopathic Manipulative Treatment - OMT . Control Group ( CG ) - patient subject CT receive sham treatment simulate OMT blind participant . After treatment , patient re-evaluated 8 week ' time . Statistical analysis : The SF-36 perform Wilcoxon 's non parametric test , pain intensity diagram Visual Analogic Scale ( VAS ) perform Sign test , intense pain evaluation diagram VAS Student 's T test .
